title: xuzerBTC
author: xuzerBTC
content: Hello everyone,A few weeks ago, we announced the launch of our Bitcoin API and requested feedback from the community. If you haven't had the chance to try it out yet, we encourage you to do so and share your thoughts with us.You can find the original post announcing the project at https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5444604.msg61900231#msg61900231.Additionally, we want to clarify that our API is not yet monetized, so any donation from the community would be greatly appreciated as we work towards that goal.Thank you in advance for your support and feedback.

comments.author: Cantsay
comments.body: You could have just posted in your previous thread, because this board doesn't get a lot of traffic, so only a few people visit and comment on threads here, and your previous thread is just above this current thread (at the time of me making this reply). Anyone following your project would still be able to see your response if you had responded there.

comments.author: Hatchy
comments.body: Quote from: Cantsay on April 11, 2023, 01:03:15 PMYou could have just posted in your previous thread, because this board doesn't get a lot of traffic, so only a few people visit and comment on threads here, and your previous thread is just above this current thread (at the time of me making this reply). Anyone following your project would still be able to see your response if you had responded there.Yes you are right. He should have just made a new post under previous thread. From the look of things your previous reviews complained so much about errors and couldn't access your API, so I hope you have fixed all those error. Merapi.io will be a great help to developers so please keep the good work up...
